extendedInfo.description: The best phrases to use in WeChat, highly recommended for use.You enjoy these wonderful phrases that will make you look good with your friends and family.All you can hear, the only thing necessary is that the libraries have installed Google TTs.The sentences will emerge at random to not always see the same phrases. There are quite a bit so it is provable recurrence.The you can share with anyone by WeChat (also with all your social networks: Facebook, Twitter, Line, WhatsApp ...).Remember if you want to add a sentence that is not, you can send it to us by mail and at the next update will be included.
